name: GASP
description: Gasp is a decentralized exchange designed as an application-specic Layer 2 (L2) rollup with omnichain connectivity, leveraging EigenLayerâ€™s restaked ETH for computation correctness and nalization. With a goal of being a consolidation layer for all crypto assets, the Gasp platform employs optimistic rollup technology to facilitate gas-free, native cross-chain swaps without reliance on traditional bridges, ensuring tokens retain their original L1 grade security.
